metadata.title: Cyqle | The AI-Powered Collaborative Cloud Browser
metadata.description: Transform your workflow with the world's first collaborative cloud browser featuring intelligent AI automation.

hero.title: The Collaborative Smart Browser
hero.description: With the AI Agent that automates your entire stack.

aiAutomation.title: AI That Works For You
aiAutomation.description: Record any browser action and turn it into a reusable, shareable automation. Let our AI handle the grunt work.

cloudNative.title: Access From Anywhere
cloudNative.description: Your entire browsing environment lives in the cloud. Pick up exactly where you left off, on any device.

collaboration.title: True Multiplayer Browsing
collaboration.description: Invite your team into a shared session. See each other's cursors, type together, and solve problems in real-time.

instantEnvironments.title: On-Demand Workspaces
instantEnvironments.description: Instantly launch tailored browser sessions for flawless sales demos, new hire onboarding, or secure testing. All tabs and logins, ready in a click.

development.title: Development
development.description: Share local development environments, debug collaboratively, and ensure every team member is on the same page.

qa.title: QA & Testing
qa.description: Reduce testing cycles by 70%. Automate browser tests, reproduce bugs instantly, and collaborate on fixes.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support
customerSupport.description: Cut resolution times in half. Instantly launch a shared session to see, guide, and solve customer issues.

operations.title: Operations
operations.description: Automate routine checks, data entry, and system monitoring without writing a single line of code.

aiSection.title: Put Your Workflow on Autopilot
aiSection.description: Our AI watches how you work, identifies repetitive patterns, and suggests automations you can build in seconds. No code required.
items: Automate any task with one-click recording
Schedule jobs to run anytime, on any site
Build a shared library of automations for your team
Connect to your stack with powerful integrations

items.quote: Cyqle has cut our customer resolution time by 40%. A game-changer for our support operations!
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.quote: Our QA productivity has soared. Cyqle's automation has saved us hundreds of hours.
items.author: Michael Chen

items.quote: Cyqle has bridged the gap between our development and operations. Collaboration has never been better!
items.author: Alex Rodriguez

cta.title: Stop Switching. Start Shipping.
cta.description: Transform how you develop, test, and deliver value to your users. Get started with your free trial today.

footer.description: The shared browser for high-performance teams.
